name: SUPERCOLD (import-this)
description:
A 2D HTML5 browser game with the clever mechanics of SUPERHOT.

You can play the latest version of the standalone game on GitHub pages or view the source code on GitHub.

You can also find the latest version on:

  • Newgrounds
  • Game Jolt

Time moves when YOU move.
Kill all the bots to advance to the next level.
There are infinite levels. Try to go as far as you can.

There are also with several mutators to try out.
Reach higher levels to unlock all of them.
I'll probably add some more in the future.

Post a topic in the community or Facebook and tell me what else you would like to see in the game! All suggestions are valuable and welcome. :)

Made with Phaser.

Thank you for your support! Hope you enjoy. :)
